text: 2:2 2 Korin 11:13; 2 Pita 2:1; 1 Jon 4:1; Akar Mogomem 2:9; 2:13; 2:19; 3:1; 3:8; 3:15Ia Kraisɨn adarasi, ian arazir ia amiba kɨ bar dagh fo. Egha kɨ fo, ia pamtem ingarigha, tuivigha gavgafi. Egha gumazamizir kurabar aghua. Gumazamizir kaba ia mɨgɨa ghaze, ‘E uaghan aposelba.’ Puvatɨ, me aposelba puvatɨ. Ezɨ ia men mɨgɨrɨgɨaba tuisigha gɨvagha, men nɨghnɨzir ifavarim gɨfogha ghaze, me pura gumazamizir ifavariba.
